channel.title: Yandex Metrica Connection
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm having trouble creating a Yandex Metrica data source.
I run through https://yandex.com/dev/metrika/ to get the OAuth Token, ensuring that the app has scope for Yandex Metrica, which provides smth like.
ID: <id> Password: <pw> Callback URL: TTL of token: At least 1 year Date created: <today>
^^ i.e. OAuth token created but with no callback URL.
In redash --> data source, I input the name of the app and the OAuth ID but receive the below error: ``` {"errors":[{"error_type":"invalid_token","message":"Invalid oauth_token"}],"code":403,"message":"Invalid oauth_token"} ```
Any ideas what the issue is here?
Thanks! James
